channel.title: Basics :: Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: Discover what this Hugo theme is all about and the core-concepts behind it.

item.title: What's New
item.description: This document shows you what’s new in the latest release and flags it with one of the following badges. For a detailed list of changes, see the history page.

item.title: Requirements
item.description: Thanks to the simplicity of Hugo, this page is as empty as this theme needs requirements.

item.title: Installation
item.description: The following steps are here to help you initialize your new website. If you don’t know Hugo at all, we strongly suggest you learn more about it by following this great documentation for beginners.

item.title: Configuration
item.description: On top of Hugo’s global configuration options, the Relearn theme lets you define further options unique to the theme in your hugo.toml.

item.title: Branding
item.description: The Relearn theme provides configuration options to change your site’s colors, favicon and logo. This allows you to easily align your site visuals to your desired style. Most of these options are exposed through so called color variants.

item.title: Customization
item.description: Usage scenarios The theme is usable in different scenarios, requiring the following mandatory settings in your hugo.toml. All settings not mentioned can be set to your liking.

item.title: Stylesheet generator
item.description: This interactive tool may help you to generate your own color variant stylesheet.

item.title: Topbar Modification
item.description: The theme comes with a reasonably configured topbar.

item.title: History
item.description: Changelog 6.4.1 (2024-10-11) What’s new in this release Fixes [bug] highlight: remove additional newlines from code if copied from cursor selection #925 6.4.0 (2024-09-12) What’s new in this release
